Światowy Dzień Ziemi 2021
International Mother Earth Day was established in 2009, by the United  Nations General Assembly under Resolution A/RES/63/278. It recognizes  that "the Earth and its ecosystems are our home" and that "it is  necessary to promote harmony with nature and the Earth." 

The term Mother Earth is used because it "reflects the interdependence  that exists among human beings, other living species and the planet we  all inhabit". 

It is decided to designate April 22 as International Mother Earth Day.
